headline: Omdia: Global Cloud Infrastructure Spending Hits $102.6 Billion, up 25% in Q3 2025
summary: LONDON, December 22, 2025--According to new research from Omdia, global spending on cloud infrastructure services reached $102.6 billion in Q3 2025, representing 25% year-on-year growth. Market momentum remained stable, marking the fifth consecutive quarter in which growth has remained above 20% highlighting continued strength across the sector. This performance reflects a significant shift in the technology landscape as enterprise demand for AI moves beyond early experimentation toward scaled p

headline: Analysis-How AI boom is pressuring videogame console industry in race for memory chips
summary: Videogame console sales were already under pressure owing to tariff turmoil and weak consumer spending.  Now a surge in the prices of memory chips is threatening to make the devices costlier in what could be ​another blow to the industry.  Demand for dynamic random access memory - chips used in Sony's PlayStation, Microsoft's Xbox and the Nintendo ‌Switch 2 - has exceeded supply as the tech sector races to build out artificial intelligence infrastructure.

content.title: Analysis-How AI boom is pressuring videogame console industry in race for memory chips
content.summary: Videogame console sales were already under pressure owing to tariff turmoil and weak consumer spending.  Now a surge in the prices of memory chips is threatening to make the devices costlier in what could be ​another blow to the industry.  Demand for dynamic random access memory - chips used in Sony's PlayStation, Microsoft's Xbox and the Nintendo ‌Switch 2 - has exceeded supply as the tech sector races to build out artificial intelligence infrastructure.

headline: Microsoft Stock Has 29% Upside in 2026, Says Dan Ives. Why It’s an AI Front-Runner.
summary: 2025 was merely the prologue in  Microsoft’s  artificial-intelligence story.  2026 will be the inflection point, say analysts at Wedbush Securities led by noted AI bull Dan Ives.  In a research note Monday, Wedbush reiterated an Outperform rating and a $625 price target for Microsoft stock heading into the new year.

content.title: Microsoft Stock Has 29% Upside in 2026, Says Dan Ives. Why It’s an AI Front-Runner.

headline: Market will be more volatile than 'patient' on AI CapEx
summary: US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) are ticking up on Monday to start the shortened trading week. What is Wall Street's market outlook for 2026 as more experts consider the risk tied to certain variables, such as the debt profiles attached to the AI trade? The Wealth Alliance President and Managing Director Eric Diton shares his thoughts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Market will be more volatile than 'patient' on AI CapEx
content.description:
US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) are ticking up on Monday to start the shortened trading week. What is Wall Street's market outlook for 2026 as more experts consider the risk tied to certain variables, such as the debt profiles attached to the AI trade?

The Wealth Alliance President and Managing Director Eric Diton shares his thoughts.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
